verify_email.subject: Verify your email address
verify_email.heading: Verify your email address
verify_email.welcome: Welcome! Thank you for signing up. To complete your registration, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verify_email.alternative: or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
verify_email.expiry: This verification link will expire in 7 days. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this email.
verify_email.footer: This email was sent to {fullName}. If you did not sign up for an account, please ignore this email.

reset_password.subject: Reset your password
reset_password.heading: Reset your password
reset_password.request: We received a request to reset your password. If you did not make this request, please ignore this email.
reset_password.instructions: To reset your password, please click the button below:
reset_password.ignore: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
reset_password.alternative: or copy and paste this URL into your browser:
reset_password.footer: This invitation was intended for {fullName}. This reset was sent from {resetFromIp}. If you were not expecting this reset, you can ignore this email. If you are concerned about your account's safety, please reply to this email to get in touch with us.
